properties.title: Cocoon Main Site - Relaunch of cocoon.apache.org
properties.author: Apache Cocoon Documentation Team

div.div:
Relaunch of cocoon.apache.org
We are pleased to announce the publishing of the new website of Apache Cocoon. This relaunch comprises a new design for the main site and the Cocoon 2.2 documentation.
The new documentation reflects the new structure of Cocoon 2.2 with a
small core
which is based on the subprojects "Cocoon Configuration" and "Cocoon Servlet-Service Framework"
blocks with additional functionality (e.g. PDF or SVG creation, form frameworks, etc.)
and Maven 2 plugins. The content was also cleaned up so that information which had become irrelevant for 2.2 was removed, though this is a still ongoing process.
We are happy to receive your feedback (dev[at]cocoon.apache.org) or your additions and improvements (follow the 'edit' link on the bottom of a page).Enjoy!
